Name: 记得我
About the game: One day, when I was adopted as a child, I suddenly received a letter with only a signature. My dead sister appeared in my life again. I thought it was someone's prank, but she actually appeared in front of me. Across more than ten years of time, when we meet again can you remember, whether it is me or you. Remember Me is a galgame with a male first-person perspective. Players will play a high school student Lin Yining, and three girls launched their own story. It's up to you to choose between the hidden past and the future to reveal. • Original and exquisite CG and other original paintings; • Touching original musical songs; • Progressive multi-line exciting story; • Exquisite CG original paintings; • Full Dubbing in Chinese;
